Question_2_to_5

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Question_2_to_5.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    A deck class, simulating the properties and things you can do in a real deck (Shuffle, Draw, Place, and keep track of the amount of cards). The deck class uses the Card.java to create the cards themselves.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int MAX_SIZE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Default constructor, initializing the full deck, and its cards.
      Deck(boolean fullDeck)
      Overloads the default constructor in case the user wants to initialize an empty deck.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card drawCard()
      Draws a card from the deck, while simultaneously reducing the size of the deck.
      int getDeckSize()
      Returns the deck size of the deck / how many cards are in the deck.
      boolean hasCardsRemaining()
      Checks if the deck still has cards remaining (deck size greater than 0).
      void placeCard(Card card)
      Changes the deck into an array list, where a new card can be added.
      void shuffle()
      Shuffles the cards inside the deck randomly.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Turns the deck into a readable string in the output.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

        Default constructor, initializing the full deck, and its cards.

      • Deck

        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • drawCard

        public Card drawCard()
        Draws a card from the deck, while simultaneously reducing the size of the deck.
        Returns:
        the card drawn.

      • placeCard

        public void placeCard(Card card)
        Changes the deck into an array list, where a new card can be added. This is changed again into the original array of cards object and removes all null characters.
        Parameters:
        card - Which card would be placed to the deck.

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Shuffles the cards inside the deck randomly.

      • getDeckSize

        public int getDeckSize()
        Returns the deck size of the deck / how many cards are in the deck.
        Returns:
        amount of cards inside the deck.

      • hasCardsRemaining

        public boolean hasCardsRemaining()
        Checks if the deck still has cards remaining (deck size greater than 0).
        Returns:
        true if it still has cards, false if it's empty.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Turns the deck into a readable string in the output.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the string built for an output.
